text: @realDonaldTrump @VP @KellyannePolls @DHSgov @CDCgov @CDCDirector @DeptofDefense @TuckerCarlson @FoxNews #COVID19 The homeless population’s immune systems don’t overreact & cause a cytokine storm. This is also why bats can harbor so many viruses without being killed. This needs to be examined.
